phrases: Shigeo, wait!

Is that your mind?

I am not interested.

Wait, is that all you can do?
You are free to go.
Maybe you are the guy, then.
Show me your powers!
You have got a lousy attitude, kid.
If you want to see my powers so badly, I will show you!
They are fighting!
Some old guy and a middle school kid!
I have impregnable armor made out of energy.
And I beat the crap out of my enemies.
That is my style.
Seriously...
Could you guys quit wasting my time?
Looks like you have a decent barrier.
Is that your power?!
Quit messing with me!
I want to see this power that can create dummies!
Why did you attack my house?!
Someone call an ambulance and the police!
You have got the wrong idea...
We were on our way to attack your house...
What?
Hey!
Who said you could pass out?!
Hey!
Damn it...
I have contacted the upper echelon.
Now you are totally screw... ed.

Seems there are more espers on the way.
We need to
I have not gotten any information yet, though.
If they have more friends coming, I will just have to ask them.
An umbrella?
Hey, you little shit.
You in trouble?
Chill with the murderous vibe back there.
Former Claw 7th Division Member Koyama
We are not trying to start any trouble with you.
Right?
Former Claw 7th Division Member
Sakurai
If you have any questions, I will answer them for you, kid.
My family's wherever you are taking me, are not they?
Your family?
No, they are not.
Then I have no reason to go.
Let me out.
Hang on!
Your friends and master are waiting there!
Reigen's there?
In that case, we need to hurry!
Yo, yo, wait, wait!
Do not be crazy!
Ugh, I am going to throw up...
But we managed to shake anyone who was tailing us.
We brought him.
Here is Kageyama Shigeo.
Long time no see, kid.
You have not let yourself go, have you?
I know we used to be rivals, but I look forward to working with you...
What the hell kind of gathering is this?
Mob, are you all right?
Master...
My home...
My family...
Go on, but have a seat.
I will actually explain everything in Shigeo's place.
Currently explaining the situation
I see.
Dimple, I need to talk to you for a sec.
Sure.
Did you just panic and lie about the dummies?
Kind
Of, but I do have reasons to believe it.
You must have really been panicking.
If Mob finds out you lied, he is going to hate you forever.
Mob, I need to talk to you.
Are you going to tell him?
Hang on a sec!
If he learns the truth...
Mob, your family...
I think they are safe, too.
Those guys were still on the way to your house, right?
Someone must have known what was going on and saved them.
They started the fire and made them look dead
so they would not be targeted anymore.
Is not that great?
The moment he relaxed, he fell fast asleep.
Now it is your turn to talk.
What the hell brought you lot together?
Are not these guys from Claw?!
Former Claw 7th Division Member Tsuchiya
Us members of the 7th Division left Claw.
After being annihilated by a group of middle school kids,
Former Claw 7th Division Member Mukai
we realized just how foolish we were.
Mole
Former Claw 7th Division Member Muraki
And now, we are all trying to start a new life.
Following Master Reigen's example,
we are trying to find a way to use our powers for the good of society.
But the organization does not let traitors go.
We figured they would come after us sooner rather than later,
but this was a lot faster than we anticipated.
Former Claw 7th Division Member Terada
And they launched attacks on all of us at the same time.
I am impressed you survived that.
Who do you think we are?
We are former Scars.
Right, Tsucchi?
Yeah.
But the real battle will begin after the guys from HQ show up.
And then, we realized that
we are going to need a leader if we want to stand a chance against HQ.
And so, they came to me.
You should probably shut up for a bit.
When we saw Master Reigen put the TV and media people in their place,
we thought he was a genius.
He is able to see the bigger picture and make things happen.
I seriously do not know about these guys...
You did not get attacked?
My office was destroyed.
I just happened to be away when it happened, thankfully.
Since I gained popularity from my TV appearances,
I thought I could get some renovations done.
That is my office.
Spirits and Such Consultation Office
It is on fire...
But that is going to have to wait.
After that, these guys picked me up.
I was already exhausted from the marathon.
Talk about a crappy day.
I wonder if Teru-san's okay.
Oh, I got a message from him earlier.
He said he is fine.
They exchanged emails
When'd that happen?
This sucks...
What are you guys doing here?
We are trying to lay low after what happened with the 7th Division.
Mitsuura-san prepared this hideout for us.

I am so moved!
Oh, him.
Teru-san!
Heya.
Looks like the gang's all here.

You will never get a word out of me!

Sorry!

I see...
Espers from around the world, eh?
Do not tell me you fools still plan to face us after hearing that...
What shall we do, Master Reigen?
Well, we cannot just let this slide.
Let us report them to the police.
Is not it amazing?
Claw Foreigner Squad Joseph

I am so excited.
I cannot wait to destroy it all.

Udo

Claw

Now you are live on all channels.

and they are happy to accommodate any allergies, too.

I could tell from his eyes.
He is not the type to blow up without a real good reason.

What?

Does an elephant that is about to crush a thousand ants

I am really starting to feel sorry for you.

I can at least take you out here!
What?!
Well done.

Huh?

So yes,
On Women's Empowerment Lecturer: Prime Minister Yabe Hiroshi
by providing women more opportunities to start their own business
and expanding the range of childcare welfare,

Nice to meet you, Prime Minister.
Ultimate 5 Shimazaki

I have come to abduct you today.
Prime Minister, please come this way!
Who the hell do you think you are?
Hey, by the way, are you broadcasting this on TV?
Damn it!
Shut up!
Do not move!
I sure hope we end up on breaking news.
Stop!
Do not move!
Does he have a gun?
Freeze!
You missed.

I can predict people's movements.
But even if I am hit, I really have nothing to worry about.
See?

You see...
I can teleport.
Why are you kidnapping me?
What do you plan to do with me?
Nothing complicated.
You are just a hostage.
Are you serious about this world domination crap?
Oh, yes.
Very much so.
And who might you be?

What a funny thing to say.

That quick?
Thanks for entertaining me.
Hanazawa!
Hey!
Wake up!
